name: HACKERNEWS__GET_STORIES
description: Gets the current list of stories for a given Hacker News category, such as 'top', 'new', or 'best'.

story_type.description: The category of stories to fetch. Defaults to 'top'.

limit.description: The maximum number of stories to return. Defaults to 10.

name: HACKERNEWS__GET_USER_DETAILS
description: Looks up a Hacker News user by their username and returns public details like their karma score and join date.

username.description: The case-sensitive Hacker News username to look up (e.g., 'pg').

name: HACKERNEWS__SEARCH_STORIES
description: Finds Hacker News stories that match a specific search term or phrase.

query.description: The keyword or phrase to search for (e.g., 'generative ai').
